metadata.feature_description: Export analytics data to various formats for external analysis

steps.action: Login to DNN site as SuperUser
steps.expected: Login succeeds and PersonaBar is accessible
steps.actual: Login successful, PersonaBar visible with Dashboard menu

steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with Export button visible
steps.actual: Community Analytics dashboard loaded successfully showing Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki tabs with Export button visible in header area

steps.action: Click Export button on Answers module analytics
steps.expected: Excel file download initiates with module-specific filename
steps.actual: File 'Answers.xlsx' (10247 bytes) successfully downloaded to browser downloads folder

observations: Export functionality is available on each module tab (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) with its own Export button
Export format is Excel (.xlsx) only - no CSV option visible in the UI
Filename is automatically generated based on the selected module name (e.g., 'Answers.xlsx')
Export includes data for the selected time period as shown in the date range picker (21 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026)
Code review confirms export uses SpreadsheetExport/Excel API endpoint with parameters: period, startDate, endDate, comparativeTerm, moduleName
